==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} (''{{w|Shuowen}}''), indicating a ladle-shaped ''dou'' (see below) held by hand.

===Etymology 1===
{{zh-forms|alt=𤣫,𠦁,𣁬}}
Pronunciations 1 (“dipper, ladle”) and 2 (“water ladle”) are cognate. Variant character: {{zh-l|枓|ladle}}. They probably belong to the same word family as {{och-l|注|to pour}}, as a derived noun. Within Sino-Tibetan, compare {{cog|bo|ཆུ||water}}, {{m|bo|འཆུ||to scoop up, to ladle water}}.

|c=dau2

|md=dāu
|mn=táu/tó͘
|mn_note=táu - vernacular, tó͘ - literary
|w=2teu
|mc=y
|oc=1,1
|cat=n,a,pn
}}

=====Definitions=====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# A [[dipper]] or [[cup]]-like object, used in ancient China as a wine vessel.
#* {{zh-x|斗量|to measure with ''dou''; numerous}}
#* {{zh-x|斗筲|''dou'' and ''xiao''; humble; insignificant}}
# Any ''dou''-shaped object; [[dipper]], [[ladle]].
#: {{zh-x|漏斗|funnel}}
#: {{zh-x|熨斗|flatiron}}
#* {{zh-x|煙斗|tobacco pipe}}
#* {{zh-x|風斗|wind scoop}}
#* {{zh-x|水斗|water ladle}}
#* {{zh-x|墨斗|carpenter's ink marker}}
#* {{zh-x|抽斗|drawer}}
#* {{zh-x|斗笠|wide-brimmed rain hat}}
#* {{zh-x|斗篷|cape, cloak}}
# Round or spiral shaped; [[fingerprint]] (a [[dactylogram]])
# A unit of dry measure (for grains, especially rice) roughly equal to 1 [[decaliter]].
# A unit of measure based on ''dou''.
#* {{zh-x|升斗|''sheng'' and ''dou''; a small amount}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[small]], [[short]], [[narrow]] (as with a dipper)
#* {{zh-x|斗室|small room}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} [[big]], [[high]], to be [[full]] of (as with a dipper)
#* {{zh-x|斗膽|venture; boldly}}
# [[star|Star]]s in general.
#* {{zh-x|星斗|stars}}
# ({{zh-l|*北斗}}) The [[Big Dipper]], an [[asterism]] of seven stars.
#* {{zh-x|星移斗轉|passage of time}}
#* {{zh-x|泰斗|the leading authority}}
# ({{zh-l|*斗宿}}) The {{w|Dipper (Chinese constellation)}}, one of the twenty-eight [[mansion]]s of the Chinese constellations.
# ({{zh-l|*南斗}}) A subconstellation of the above mansion, consisting of six stars.
# ({{zh-l|*小北斗}}) The [[Little Dipper]], a constellation of six stars.
# [[w:zh:斗 (星官)|A Chinese constellation]]  ({{zh-l|*星官}}) consisting of five stars.
# {{zh-abbrev|刁斗|[[cauldron]], [[cymbal]]}}
# {{zh-abbrev|科斗|tadpole}}
# ({{zh-l|*斗姆}}) [[w:zh:斗姆|''Doumu'']], a [[goddess]] in [[Taoism]].
# {{zh-alt-form|*枓|the system of [[wood]] [[bracket]]s on the top of a [[column]] supporting the [[crossbeam]]}}
#* {{zh-x|斗拱|corbel bracket}}
# {{zh-alt-form|陡|steep, cliffy}}
# {{zh-alt-form|陡|suddenly, in a sudden}}
# {{zh-alt-form|抖|to tremble, to shake off}}
